name: Paul Tocatlian
overview:
Technology professional with a keen interest in mobile, middleware, cloud, and web technologies.
Paul Tocatlian is currently Vice President of Engineering at Magnet Systems, reporting to founder and CEO, Alfred Chuang. Responsibilities include product management, software engineering, technical publications, and technical operations.
Magnet Systems is building a mobile software platform to accelerate the emergence of a new generation of enterprise applications. Combining mobile, social and cloud technologies, Magnet
